Symptom 2: The headlights go out as the engine was cranking
Symptom 3: There is a cruddy-like substance on the terminals
car_problem: Flow of electrical current to starter interfered

Symptom 2: The headlights go out as the engine was cranking
Symptom 3: There is no cruddy-like substance on the terminals
car_problem: Weak battery or  Recharge the battery

Symptom 2: The headlights go out as the engine was cranking
Symptom 3: Fuel tank is empty
car_problem: car out of fuel

Symptom 2: The headlights did not go out as the engine was cranking
Symptom 3: There is grinding or growling sound
car_problem: Bad starter

Symptom 2: The headlights did not go out as the engine was cranking
Symptom 3: There is no grinding or growling sound
car_problem: Frozen battery

Symptom 2: There is white smoke coming from the exhaust while driving
Symptom 3: There is no grinding or growling sound
car_problem: Condensation in steaming off

Symptom 2: There is white smoke coming from the exhaust while driving
Symptom 3: The engine has warmed up
car_problem: blown head gasket

Symptom 2: There is black smoke coming from the exhaust while driving
Symptom 3: There is dirt on the air filter
car_problem: clogged air filter

Symptom 2: There is black smoke coming from the exhaust while driving
Symptom 3: There is no dirt on the air filter
car_problem: bad fuel injection sensor

Symptom 2: There is blue smoke coming from the exhaust always
Symptom 3: The engine has less power than it used to be when going up hills
car_problem: bad rings

Symptom 2: There is blue smoke coming from the exhaust while accelerating
car_problem: bad valve stem seals

Symptom 2: There is blue smoke coming from the exhaust always
Symptom 3: The engine power is as it used to be
car_problem: leaking turbocharger seals

Symptom 2: Loss of engine power occurs suddenly
Symptom 3: Fuel injectors are clogged

Symptom 2: The headlights go out as the engine was cranking
Symptom 3: Smell of Fuel
car_problem: Car is flooded

Symptom 3: low coolant level warning light is on
car_problem: Lack of coolant

Symptom 3: no low coolant level warning light is on
car_problem: The cooling system is clogged - it needs to be cleaned

Symptom 3: The air conditioner is on most of the time
car_problem: check the ventilation unit

Symptom 3: Air conditioner is off most of the time
car_problem: The alternator belt may be slipping or the fan clutch may be damaged

Symptom 3: The smoke comes out of the exhaust while driving
car_problem: Check if the air filter is clean. If so then check the fuel injection sensor

Symptom 3: The smoke comes out of the exhaust when starting and then stops
car_problem: The engine sensor may be faulty

Symptom 3: The smoke comes out of the exhaust while driving even after the engine has warmed up
car_problem: A new head gasket may be needed

Symptom 3: The smoke comes out of the exhaust while driving and stops after the engine has warmed up
car_problem: This is a normal situation

Symptom 3: cold weather
car_problem: This is a normal situation

Symptom 3: The smoke comes out during startup and then stops
car_problem: The engine sensor may be damaged

Symptom 3: It happens while braking
car_problem: Matching problem between the brake pads and the front discs

Symptom 3: It happens during acceleration
car_problem: Check for a vacuum leak or moisture in the distributor cap (distributor)

Symptom 3: It happens while driving at a certain speed
car_problem: Check the balance of the four wheels

Symptom 3: The braking also has vibrations from the front
car_problem: Matching problem between the brake pads and the front discs

Symptom 3: It only happens under heavy braking and there is no vibration from the front end
car_problem: This is a normal situation. The anti lock system pulsates the brakes

Symptom 3: It happens while braking
car_problem: Matching problem between the brake pads and the front discs

Symptom 3: Coming From Engine Compartment
car_problem: Fuel Rail or Fuel Pressure Regulator Leak or Fuel Injector Leak

Symptom 3: Rear of the Vehicle
car_problem: Fuel Tank Leak or Fuel Pump Assembly Failure or Fuel Filter Leak

Symptom 2: Only when engine is running or  idling.
Symptom 3: Inside the vehicle when the heat or A/C is turned on.
car_problem: Fuel Rail or Fuel Pressure Regulator Leak

Symptom 2: Only when engine is running or  idling.
Symptom 3: Only outside the vehicle.
car_problem: Fuel Tank Leak
Exhaust System Leak
Exhaust Leak (Front Pipe) or Exhaust Manifold Gasket Leak
A/C vents (Foul Smell)
Rich Fuel Condition or Catalytic Converter Failure
Engine Oil Leak (Odor)
Leaking heater core

car_problem: Coolant Leak (smoke)

Symptom 2: lack of response in the steering wheel
car_problem: Power Steering Rack (Internal Wear) or Loose/Worn Tie Rod Ends
Uneven Tire Pressure or Wheels out of Alignment or Loose or Worn Front End Component
Dragging Front Brake or  Wheels out of Alignment or  Loose or Worn Front End Component
